Stem: Covered in sharp yellow to red prickles.
Leaves: Sticky, greenish to yellowish, 5-14 cm long with deep lobes. Hairy and with prickles on either side.
Flowers: White or pale bluish-purple. Star-shaped typical nightshade with 5 petals and bright yellow anthers in centre.
FruitSeeds: Berries which ripen to bright red. 1.5-2 cm diameter.
Habitat: Roadsides, pastures, waste land, riparian areas, rocky slopes.
